attributes.comment:
I strongly appose the substantial fee increase in the proposed rule because:

(1) all the legal immgrants-to-be are tax-payers. Congress should support at least
part of expenses for USCIS. It is unfair and may against the basic spirit of the
USA constitution that goverment only collects money from immgrants-to-be and
do not provide any service. If so, it will commerciallized the appearance of USA;

(2)FBI name chekc is a real bottleneck of expediting the LPR or citizenship
applications. There is a increasing backlog at FBI name check. Only increasing
fee for USCIS will have little effect on the speeding the applicationS. Congress
should work out a new way witH FBI and USCS to speed up the name check
process;

(3) Illegal border crossing is a real threatening to this country, of who may have
terrorists. USCIS, FBI and other govermental agencies should foucs on checking
them for improving homeland security. They illegally live and work here. But
nobody cares while some policitians advocate to legalized them. On the contrary,
all legal immgrants-to-be came to this coutry with legal visas. They pay taxes and
now have to pay much more money for the EADs, visa applications, petitons and
adjustment applications. It seems that this country is encouaging illegal activitiies
and put a heavy yoke all the legal ones.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
